content: Hi there ! I'm a Maths student hoping to do a summer project formalizing some maths !
Hi Paul! In what year are you, now?
I'm currently a second year student (I study in Britain, but have been spending quite a lot of time at home in France because of the lockdowns)
Ah, I see. So you're looking for a British summer project!
Ideally ! I'm applying for something with my university at the minute !
